title: Test facility
fullText:
Where a test facility is required, it shall be a socket-outlet with round pin earth in accordance with AS/NZS 3112 and be readily accessible.
The test facility shall be identified in accordance with Clause 2.12.1 and as follows:
(a)	With the words 'TEST ONLY'. A RCD protected label is not required.
(b)	With an identification of the RCD and the equipment. This shall be in the style 'from RCD X/DENTAL CHAIR Y'.
(c)	White in colour.
